name: payload
description: Payload is a headless CMS and application framework for building custom APIs, admin UIs, and content workflows. It supports TypeScript, plugins, and self-hosting or cloud deployment.
features: Headless CMS: API-first content management with flexible content modeling and automatic REST and GraphQL API generation
TypeScript native: Built with TypeScript for type-safe development, better IDE support, and reduced runtime errors
Custom admin UI: Auto-generated admin interface based on your schema with customizable components and layouts
Access control: Granular permissions system controls who can read, create, update, or delete content at field and document levels
Plugin system: Extend functionality with plugins for SEO, search, storage, authentication, and custom business logic
Localization support: Built-in multi-language content management with field-level translations and locale-specific publishing
File management: Upload and manage media files with automatic image optimization, resizing, and cloud storage integration
Version control: Track content changes over time with version history and ability to restore previous versions
Webhooks and hooks: Trigger custom logic before or after operations, or send webhooks to external services for automation
Flexible deployment: Deploy anywhere Node.js runs including self-hosted servers, serverless platforms, or managed cloud services
